languages.text: {n}Глаза несчастного округляются в ужасе.{/n} "Если бы госпожа сего мира узнала, что мы потеряли Гордость Сантиэля... Кара ее была бы страшнее любого Кошмара".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза несчастного округляются в ужасе.{/n} "Если бы госпожа сего мира узнала, что мы потеряли Гордость Сантиэля... Кара ее была бы страшнее любого Кошмара".

languages.text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

{n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

languages.text: {n}哀れな男は恐怖で目を丸く見開いた。{/n}「もし、この世界のミストレスがサンティエル・プライドが失われたことを知ってしまったら…それはどんな悪夢よりも過酷な罰となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

traits.locale_text: {n}哀れな男は恐怖で目を丸く見開いた。{/n}「もし、この世界のミストレスがサンティエル・プライドが失われたことを知ってしまったら…それはどんな悪夢よりも過酷な罰となるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Le pauvre homme écarquille les yeux de terreur.{/n} « Si la dirigeante de ce monde apprenait que nous avons perdu la Gloire de Santiel... Sa punition serait bien pire que toutes les souffrances infligées par les cauchemars. »
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pauvre homme écarquille les yeux de terreur.{/n} « Si la dirigeante de ce monde apprenait que nous avons perdu la Gloire de Santiel... Sa punition serait bien pire que toutes les souffrances infligées par les cauchemars. »

languages.text: {n}这个可怜人惊恐地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“要是女主人知道我们没能守住桑提尔之傲……她的惩罚会比梦魇的一切折磨更加可怕。”
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个可怜人惊恐地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“要是女主人知道我们没能守住桑提尔之傲……她的惩罚会比梦魇的一切折磨更加可怕。”

languages.text: {n}Al pobre hombre se le agrandan los ojos por el terror.{/n} «Si la señora de este mundo supiera que hemos perdido Orgullo de Santiel... El castigo sería peor que el de cualquier pesadilla».
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al pobre hombre se le agrandan los ojos por el terror.{/n} «Si la señora de este mundo supiera que hemos perdido Orgullo de Santiel... El castigo sería peor que el de cualquier pesadilla».

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des armen Mannes weiten sich vor Entsetzen.{/n} "Hätte die Herrin dieser Welt erfahren, dass wir Santiels Stolz verloren haben ... Die Strafe wäre schlimmer gewesen als alles, was ein Albtraum anrichten kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des armen Mannes weiten sich vor Entsetzen.{/n} "Hätte die Herrin dieser Welt erfahren, dass wir Santiels Stolz verloren haben ... Die Strafe wäre schlimmer gewesen als alles, was ein Albtraum anrichten kann."

languages.text: {n}Zavallı adamın gözleri, korku içinde kocaman açılıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyanın hanımı, Santiel'in Gururu'nu kaybettiğimizi duysaydı... Alacağımız ceza, tüm Kâbusların verebileceğinden daha acılı olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}The poor man's eyes grow round and wide with terror.{/n} "Had the mistress of this world learned we lost Santiel's Pride... The punishment would be more dire than any Nightmare can inflict."
